title: Bitter gourd stir fry👌 | Kakarakaya Vepudu  | Side Dish
content:
Side dish recipe: Bitter Gourd Stir Fry  Servings: 4 Duration: 20 mins  I feel epicure when ever I have this distinctive taste than comparing with other vegetables because it tastes bitter but I like the way it is . The bitterness has many health benefits they are:
  • It Helps in maintaining blood sugar levels
  • Lowering bad cholesterol
  • For glowing skin and lustrous hair
  • Works well to Cleansing liver
  • Helps in weight loss
  • Improves immune system and eyes 👀
See, these many peculiar good things are available in Bitter Gourd so who says ‘no’ to it are willing to include in their diet menu 😃 Today, I prepared simple and tasty stir fry with bitter gourd. So let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Bitter Gourd/ Kakarakaya - 1/2 kg - chopped  thinly
  • Oil - 1 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1/2 tsp
  • Red chilly Powder - 1 tsp
  • Desiccated coconut (dry) - 2 Tb sp
  • Spicy Roasted chickpea Powder / Pappula podi / Bhuna Chana powder - 2 Tb sp
  • Turmeric powder - 1/4 tsp
Procedure:
  • Add oil on medium heated frying pan along with chopped Bitter Gourd
  • Saute continuously for 10 minutes or till they turn color
  • Next add salt, turmeric powder, red chilly powder and sauté 2 minutes
  • Then add Pappula Podi and dry coconut powder, sauté more 2 minutes and turn off heat
  • Tasty Side Dish is ready to serve with Palak Dal and rice topped with clarified butter 😋 You can use any kind of dal to serve
  • Happy cooking and Have a great day 😍
